DOC.brief_summary: To test whether give patient information doctor visit change care receive type information best give doctor visit .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize one three group . Before single visit diabetes care provider , patient call answer interview question health , diabetic care behavior habit . After patient visit doctor , call answer question visit . If patient place group A B , base answer question mail printed report doctor visit . The report indicate thing go patient 's diabetic care recommend question ask his/her health care provide diabetes . Group A feedback report emphasize risk diabetes feedback report Group B emphasize thing protect oneself problem diabetes . Participants randomize Group C receive print report doctor visit . No extra visit schedule participant doctor , travel require , blood test require ther doctor involve study unless study participant choose discuss his/her doctor .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age older ; Has type 2 ( adultonset ) diabetes ; Developed diabetes age 21 ; Has schedule doctor visit diabetes next month
